name: uniexplorer
description: An ecosystem for university students to explore their college virtually

scripts.clean: npm run clean-client && npm run clean-mobile && npm run clean-server
scripts.clean-install: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm run install-client && npm run install-mobile && npm run install-server
scripts.prod: npm run build-client && npm run server

author: Subiksha Shrestha
